comment: Represents the action suggested by a {@link TextClassifier} on a given conversation.

variables.name: TYPE_VIEW_CALENDAR
variables.comment: * Indicates an action to view a calendar at a specified time.

variables.name: TYPE_VIEW_MAP
variables.comment: * Indicates an action to view the map at a specified location.

variables.name: TYPE_TRACK_FLIGHT
variables.comment: * Indicates an action to track a flight.

variables.name: TYPE_OPEN_URL
variables.comment: * Indicates an action to open an URL.

variables.name: TYPE_SEND_SMS
variables.comment: * Indicates an action to send a SMS.

variables.name: TYPE_CALL_PHONE
variables.comment: * Indicates an action to call a phone number.

variables.name: TYPE_SEND_EMAIL
variables.comment: * Indicates an action to send an email.

variables.name: TYPE_TEXT_REPLY
variables.comment: * Indicates an action to reply with a text message.

variables.name: TYPE_CREATE_REMINDER
variables.comment: * Indicates an action to create a reminder.

variables.name: TYPE_SHARE_LOCATION
variables.comment: * Indicates an action to reply with a location.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(Parcel parcel, int flags)
public String getType()
methods.comment: Returns the type of this action, for example, {@link #TYPE_VIEW_CALENDAR}.

methods.name: public RemoteAction getAction()
methods.comment:
* Returns a RemoteAction object, which contains the icon, label and a PendingIntent, for
     * the specified action type.

methods.name: public float getConfidenceScore()
methods.comment:
* Returns the confidence score for the specified action. The value ranges from 0 (low
     * confidence) to 1 (high confidence).

methods.name: public CharSequence getTextReply()
methods.comment:
* Returns the text reply that could be sent as a reply to the given conversation. *

* This is only available when the type of the action is {@link #TYPE_TEXT_REPLY}.

methods.name: public Bundle getExtras()
methods.comment:
* Returns the extended data related to this conversation action. * *

NOTE: Do not modify this bundle.

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(Parcel parcel, int flags)
